website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful contouring creams in colors that highlight and define, and work well for most skin types and tones.
pros: Creamy makeup in six matte colors that correct uneven skin tone and define cheeks, brows, and more
Colors can also be used for bronzing and creating cheek color
A little goes a long way and provides long wear
cons: We love that the creams are buildable, but blending them to perfection comes with a bit of a learning curve

customer_reviews.title: Must try
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that it would not be good quality, to my surprise it was actually very good quality I’m not sure that it is the real brand however it’s dam near close perhaps even better, I have dry skin so I added a drop of maracuja oil that I also purchased from amazon and it was flawless
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: POINTLESS
customer_reviews.text: I bought after watching a Youtube tutorial. Uhhhhh, unnecessary. I didn't like the coverage, or the texture.
customer_reviews.author: JOE COOLNESS

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed the way I do makeup forever: every in one place.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have ordered it several times-always comes properly packaged and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: leya bonorris

customer_reviews.title: The way it goes on, looks when it's on and feels
customer_reviews.text: Like some makeup, when you put it on it looks washed out and you have to put more than you should to get the results you were looking for. But not with this product. It feels as good as it looks. I'll be purchasing more of this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Paskell

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage..definitely worth it...but I run out of the first square early every time !
customer_reviews.author: jacquelina

customer_reviews.title: This some good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I use it to conceal under my eyes and my eyebrows 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Shante Madison

customer_reviews.title: It's real!
customer_reviews.text: Not fake, works just like real. Put it side by side with one from Sephora!
customer_reviews.author: Treebux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that alittle product goes so far worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but I think purchased the wrong one for my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Taja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its fantastic product and its easy going for me everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: great set for contouring!
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested I try a set to add contouring for my make up regime. This set is perfect! It has wonderful colors to play with and they go on beautifully..and the best part, the company is cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great buildable color ...you can can do light to full coverage looks with this makeup palette I don't like the darkest color though to be honest it's a little too gray for me it makes me look ashy and I am in nc-42 in that's like a golden honey type of color for those who don't know so putting something ashy on me makes me look grey but none the less I have darker skin people in my family and I am a makeup artist and my niece prom is coming up so I can use it for her and her friends
customer_reviews.author: Catheline

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Smooth cream texture and easy to use if you know how to do contouring or highlighting makeup. Sturdy product, I actually dropped it and nothing broke! Con: if you have never used this type of make, it could be hard as there are no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trying to finesse it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium kit. It's creamy if you touch it was your finger but difficult to pick up product on a brush unless you wet it. Blending out the highlight was a little more difficult and time consuming than blending out the contour. I need to play with this a little more to see if i can finesse it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: IM IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Im am going to make this short. THE BESTTTTT CONTOUR KIT YOU CAN EVER BUY! IM IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, product review coming soon on my channel (irisrican ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, product review coming soon on my channel (irisrican girlygurl). Don't forget to subscribe, I always do product reviews from Amazon and I add the sellers information on my details description.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Not same as picture
customer_reviews.text: The makeup is not as pictured , the banana color is now in the middle and the colors are rearranged. I have the old version but the banana ran out so I ordered again to find the packaging different but it seems the same otherwise. Please update picture
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: marketed as brand new yet it was USED
customer_reviews.text: The description said it was brand new and upon arrival 3 shades are visibly used. I would give 0 stars if at all possible. I'm highly displeased!
customer_reviews.author: Beee

customer_reviews.title: Older version of ABH cream contour or fake kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is either the older version of ABH cream contour kit or a fake kit. I should have realized something was wrong when it cost half the price of the newer version which has much netter contour colors in it. These colors are too dark for a fair skin person like myself. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for contouring
customer_reviews.text: I have tried powder contouring and cream sticks for contouring on the face but the powder comes off during the day and the cream sticks are too noticeable. This cream palate is very nice. It enables me to control how much or little I put on my face. I finish with a translucent facial powder (which "seals" it) and top it off with a contouring powder of the same shade to add depth.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cakes & shows pores - Also caused breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and greasy, but it had great reviews so I still gave it a try. It looked very cakey and after wearing for only a few hours, caused breakouts on my cheeks where I had applied it. NOT what I expect when I pay $39.59 for high-end makeup! Now I use Benefit Hoola bronzer as a contour powder and it works so much better, doesn't cake and doesn't break me out!
customer_reviews.author: Sj773Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners and experts alike!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM OBSESSED WITH THIS CONTOUR KIT!!! I apply with with a beauty blender sponge and the color blends beautifully. I typically wear it over my foundation and use a translucent setting powder on top to set it in place, but if I'm going to be doing anything outdoors or have a long day ahead of me, I use a light layer of powder highlighter and bronzer over it and my contour lasts FOREVER!! I'm so in love with this kit. I've used it on a few of my fair skinned friends and they fell in love as well and bought kits of their own. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: votreseulpoison

customer_reviews.title: New favorite contour palette
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale for half the price. I have the Morphe powder kit and Elf cream kit. This beats them both. I can use all the shades on it, whereas other palettes you always have a left over too dark of a shade. This stays on better and the product lasts long than Elf and has better colors. Morphe has nice colors but it really doesn't have the prominent effect once blended compared to this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I love ABH products and was so excited to finally get ...
customer_reviews.text: I love ABH products and was so excited to finally get this guy. I really struggled using this product in the beginning. It's thick and hard to blend on my very dry skin. However after reading some reviews and watching how to videos on YouTube, I found that adding a few drops of oil really improved the application and helped blending. I'd recommend people with dry skin stick to the powder kit which is absolutely amazing and so easy to work with. This is probably best for people who tend to be more on the oily side but as long as you add some beauty oil, you can make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I am just learning to contour so purchased your product due to so many positive reviews.I am still experimenting with all including sponge and brush application. I love the ease of use and the finished product which I am sure will only get better with practice
customer_reviews.author: paradisegal

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stand up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: everyone raves about this pallet, but eh, I really think for the price and all the praise they could give you some actual tones that mattered. the only three I use are the totally light, the medium pinkish tone, and one dark shade to contour. the three dark shades are literally all the same color and the top left and top right are the same. and for the size and price they could at least make the top mirrored.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Clark

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: This product came with 3 identical brown shades on the bottom. It was hard to use and looks like crap. My face looks dirty because the shades would not blend at all. Would not recommend for anyone but especially not beginners like me. Save your money and get something from Ulta or Sephora that you can try out at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on contouring makeup. This has amazing pigment and VERY little needs to be used. Stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the kit in the shade light, but I received a palette with darker colors. 2 of the contour shades were the same. The top three highlight shades were (from left to right): beige, pink, and an olive/amber color. The application wasn't too good. They felt oily going on and when I blended it, they basically disappeared. You have to go heavy-handed with it for any color payoff. I do not think this is the real Anastasia contour kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Made my face breakout
customer_reviews.text: Made my face breakout. Had high hopes for this product. Love the colors but I have breakout all along where I used the darker color to contour. Stopped using it and let it clear then tried it again and broke out again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, great brand, amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe I found this at this price! Blends beautifully, such a great pallet. You can use the light shade as concealer and to brighten the under eye.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly Koelln

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: I never used to understand why people would make a big deal of the Anastasia line until I tried this and her eyeshadow kits. This is such a long lasting cream pallet and stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly, exactly as described. I was looking for cream contouring kit and this is perfect. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: PhotoT

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best creamy contour! Sooo happy I read reviews & purchased!! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This works just like advertised absolutely phenomenal can’t do without it
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Best contour palette!
customer_reviews.text: I am super pale naturally. This palette blends super easily (I use fingers for concealing and a beauty blender for contouring). Highly suggest for a customized face sculping!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella K. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ANASTACIA PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.text: Never got this item. Having issues with postal service. Never reordered. Instead went and bought it from Sephora and I love it! I only use this cream contouring on special occasions and use the powder contouring pallet for an everyday use. It is a thick cream so you may need some argan oil to be able to apply easier.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ Small

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: Received it very dry, I had to put lots of oil in it. And was swatches by someone else , so there was a finger mark when I got it
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa. G

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The cream version blends best on freshly exfoliated skin. Use brushes or sponges to thoroughly blend to avoid steaks or blotchy spots.
customer_reviews.author: Effervescence

customer_reviews.title: Yessss
customer_reviews.text: blends Really nicely, only complaint is that the lighter shades could be better coverage wise. Other than that it helps me get my makeup done super quick ! I use a brush and or a beauty blender and works well with both in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Adreeanna Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this contour kit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this contour kit. It has the perfect combination of lights and darks for my skin tone and definately gives my skin the proper contouring and shading where needed for my elder skin. great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the recommendation of YouTuber Angie of HotandFlashy. It is the best contour highlighter I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Y. Manning

customer_reviews.title: There’s no sign of it being a fake product for those who say it is..
customer_reviews.text: It was in perfect condition, just as you expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: ALL DARK CONTOUR COLORS WERE THE SAME!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Anastasia Beverly hills cream contour pallet in light and all of the dark contour colors were the same!! I even thought it must be me and tried it a few times on my face neck and arms to see if there was any variation in the colors at all and there is not. I went and watched YouTube tutorials with people who had the same palet and the dark colors are very different in variation. I am extremely extremely disappointed in this. And do not recommend ordering from Amazon or this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best contour ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a cream contour but took a leap of faith in this because Anastasia is such a high end name. I absolutely love it! It’s so easy to apply and blend!! Will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca miller

customer_reviews.title: great price, arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter and she loves it! I wouldn't say that it is difficult to apply, only that you need to practice when doing any contouring. Incredibly fast shipping, great price, arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pendry

customer_reviews.title: Good price/ Good product
customer_reviews.text: Never used anything from this brand before,it was suggested from a fav Youtube channel. The palette is very nice, good price,easy to work with ( creamy blending) and came promptly.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for cream contour and came across this as per my daughter its the best
customer_reviews.author: Great game for kids who love Perry!

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pale skin tones
customer_reviews.text: The colour is much darker than I would have liked. If you have very pale skin, I wouldn't recommend this product; medium skin tones should have an easier time with it, so I might pass it along to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, super blendable and light. Doesn't cause my skin to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Waldschlager

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the wife. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fransisco

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: It is one my new favorite products. Very pigment and a little scary to blend at first but it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Shades are different than the ones on the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Well it doesn't contain the colors we were looking for, it has fair, neutral, banana, Java, light sculpt and Havana.
customer_reviews.author: Arham Ahmedani

customer_reviews.title: ... helps to use a little oil with it for perfect blending. I love the colors (I'm white) and ...
customer_reviews.text: It helps to use a little oil with it for perfect blending. I love the colors (I'm white) and I use all 6 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smooth finish and so easy to use; all shades are useful!
customer_reviews.author: Anna A. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a very smooth application, grew mold on it, didn't seem very creamy or blendable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With the price I expected to be amazed by this product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived smuged, not creamy very dry. With the price I expected to be amazed by this product
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have light skin and can use all colors. Easy to use, and blend with my slightly wet blending sponge.
customer_reviews.author: KaliskaK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pallete i have a neutral skin it did not make me oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very rich, little goes a long way. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Very rich, little goes a long way. The browns were way too dark to be in the Light pallet. I googled images of the light pallet and I totally had different colors.
customer_reviews.author: mzheatwole

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, didn't like the colors
customer_reviews.text: I have the cheaper one at home and I feel like it's a better quality then this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these kits. Although next time I will go a little darker. I have olive colored skin when it comes to my arms but my face is a little lighter so I figured this would be good but when I apply the highlight I have to use the darkest they have otherwise I look SUPER pale. Not their fault though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fab
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth, blends nice. The colors are perfect. So happy with my new palette.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's the exact contour kit you can buy at sephora, ulta, etc. It's wonderful and has lasted almost a year!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not super easily blended
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit dry for a cream contour which makes it hard to blend and apply.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Not the real pallet.
customer_reviews.text: Its not the original Anastasia beverly hills contour cream pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Quick shipping. I use makeup daily. This was very good easy to use ( I'm no expert).
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, have not been able to buy for it a while, was so happy to be able to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. There weren't any instructions on how to apply but I found some on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mirtoni

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit for this look and was so easy to blend. I was very impressed ❤️💋
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this contour kit! The colors blend so well and it's great for my oily skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Build-able coverage and melts into your skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Build-able coverage and melts into your skin. I'm 41 and it doesn't crease under the eye. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'd put zero stars if I could. This is not a good product. Super cakey on the face and does not blend. I wish I wouldn't have spent $40 on this kit. Unless you can do makeup like the Kardashians it will look bad.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is overly cake and ends up looking like chalk on my skin. Even when combined with oil this contour palette is hard to blend and ends up looking streaky. Considering the brand, I was extremely disappointed with this. I'll definitely stick to my powder contour palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It's everything I expected it to be and more. The variety of cool and warm undertones make it easy to find your perfect blend. One thing I hope for is that I can buy the shade "banana" by itself, because it goes really fast. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikala Saska

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect with my dry skin after I add a bit of coconut oil to make it creamier. I will definitely order again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product was less expensive on Amazon than in stores! Love the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Stunning contour kit!! I use it everyday and it looks absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Maro

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: My product was used when received it. Has visible finger prints and smears in every color of the contour palette.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: looks good , I read reviews where people say that some products are not original, i think this is original
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useddddd!
customer_reviews.text: The product was used when I received it! I was so dusaapointed and grossed out. The product want cheap you know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy my palette was not used and wasn't the wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: For people saying it's fake, it's not. The palette I have from sephora online is the exact same as this palette I just received. So happy my palette was not used and wasn't the wrong shade like others have stated in their reviews. Love the palette, would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: KSporre

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product is extreme dry. It's impossible to use. I think it might be old.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole jarosh

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing product and the results it gives is hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bout this for my daughter and myself to share. It is an amazing product and the results it gives is hard to discribe. This is one of those products u have to try to believe. My favorite thing about this item is it light weightness. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed having this kit i bought. This really makes a difference on my face
customer_reviews.author: ROSA RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: ... brushed and sponges to use but sure will have fun using it
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet since i have to buy the extra brushed and sponges to use but sure will have fun using it :)
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the creamy texture. It's super blendable, and the colors are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to blend and layer
customer_reviews.text: So this was my first time purchasing a contour kit and I hit the jackpot. They are so smooth and creamy and go on well with makeup brushes. VERY easy to blend and layer. It fits great with very light to medium skin tones. I will definitely be throwing this in my daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: best contour kit
customer_reviews.text: My favorite contour kit. Looks completely natural (when used properly.) Does not break out my skin even though I suffer from a sensitive epidermis.
customer_reviews.author: meg hesser

customer_reviews.title: Lights great, darks muddy
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I'm a total contouring novice, and this was my first foray into legit contouring as opposed to just using bronzer in those spots. The dark shades just looked like mud on my face, to be honest. I LOVE the lighter shades for under eye and the light areas of contouring, but I'm using my bronzer for the darks instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sheem

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: In love!!! Great price great product easy to blend this is a must for contours or less or more experience!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: I love this contour kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this contour kit! This line has definitely not disappointed, and I'm super glad I bought it. It has a great range of tones and is easy to apply. This cream version is obviously heavier than the powder version, but its got a nice coverage scale as well. It's my go to contour kit now.
customer_reviews.author: SGreer88

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!!!! Does exactly what it's required to do. It's a little hard to blend but I use a drop of beauty oil and it blends so beautifully!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Vang

customer_reviews.title: Like it! good cream highlighter
customer_reviews.text: Like it ! good cream highlighter.. not available other places
customer_reviews.author: ar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that great to work with yet. Wish pigments were a bit less harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ovsepyan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The brow gel came as an empty tube. Absolutely nothing inside of it. Never happened to me before.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Barash

customer_reviews.title: Pro MUA prefers less intense contouring system👺.
customer_reviews.text: Contouring does not require six different colors and a banana shade (their color name, not mine). This is a creme and felt like old pancake makeup to me. You need 1, maybe two shades max or you are doing theater makeup. 2nd day, I went back to my smashbox kit, as it doesn't add 15 extra minutes to my makeup routine like the ABH Kit did.
customer_reviews.author: Sandwiches etc.

customer_reviews.title: No No No :-(
customer_reviews.text: NO NO NO! This palette just dosent work for me and I dont know why after hearing glowing reviews online. The consistency is just sooo hard and Unblendable - and the dark colors in the light kit are just TOO dark, I looked Dirty!!!!! Im sad because I really wanted to love this :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A

customer_reviews.title: It's hardly a cream! 😥
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Anastaia's products. They can be pricey but are always great quality. However, this project is hard to use... Especially if you're a beginner. The cream is sticky (it's hardly a cream), so most people I've talked to have bought an oil to loosen it up. You shouldn't have to buy a whole new product in order to make it work. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Harpring

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills - Contour Cream Kit (Plastic) - Medium
product_meta.description: Color:MediumThe patented Golden Ratio method remains at the heart of Anastasia Beverly Hills. Each product launch is inspired by makeup's unique ability to create the illusion of facial balance, symmetry, and proportion.
feature_bullets: Smooth cream formula with natural matte finish
Buildable coverage from light to full
Includes 3 highlight shades to lift, brighten and color correct skin
Includes 3 contour shades for defining, sculpting and bronzing skin
